item.title: Scaling Smart: How Small Studios Can Thrive in a Shifting Games Industry
item.description: In a recent article on PocketGamer.biz, Gennadii Potapov (CEO of General Arcade) and Andrei Morozov (CEO of Lunate Games) explore how small game studios can scale effectively amidst the current turbulence in the games industry. They emphasize the importance of adopting flexible models for global teams, fostering platforms for learning and growth, and offering full-cycle solutions without expanding recklessly. The authors also highlight the benefits of cross-studio collaboration as a strategic move in 2025.

item.title: A joint venture by General Arcade and Lunate: Beware of Bytes!
item.description:
We’re teaming up with Lunate Games to launch Beware of Bytes!, a strategic joint venture built for scale, technical excellence, and stability in today’s evolving industry.

What This Means for The Games Industry?
Two powerhouse teams are now one

We’re doubling our engineering strength and expanding our expertise across Unity, Unreal Engine, CryEngine, and custom engines. Whether it’s porting, co-dev, remastering, performance optimisation, tools development, or network implementation, our partnership delivers cutting-edge solutions at a whole new level!
